version_description:
- Performance improvements were made.
- User experience has been improved.

We are constantly updating Superlive to provide you with a better experience.
We fixed the “follow” button which was at times not working, the problems with notifications in the chat, and some other annoying bugs.
In the meantime, we’re also ironing out the kinks to make sure the app runs seamlessly :)

We are constantly updating Superlive to provide you with a better experience.
We fixed some annoying bugs and got rid of some problematic issues.
You can now choose moderators for your broadcasts! We’ve also added new language options.
Have a great time!
